definition: abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: The dissertation consists of introduction and four parts.
sentences.chinese: 全文分爲緒論和四個主要章節。

sentences.english: I always jump introduction to read books.
sentences.chinese: 我看書時常常略去緒論。

sentences.english: Based on this, the paper, including three except introduction.
sentences.chinese: 基於此，本文除了緒論外，包括三章。

sentences.english: This thesis consists of five chapters of the introduction and main text plus the conclusion totaling about fifty thousand words.
sentences.chinese: 本論文分爲緒論及正文共五章和結語，全文約5萬字。

sentences.english: A good way to end the introduction is to state the dissertation objectives.
sentences.chinese: 結束緒論的一個好辦法就是陳述這篇論文的寫作目的。

sentences.english: Besides introduction, the content is mainly divided into four parts.
sentences.chinese: 本文除緒論外，內容主要分爲四個部分。

sentences.english: This article consists of an introduction and four chapters.
sentences.chinese: 本文由緒論和四個章節組成。

sentences.english: This thesis falls into eight chapters, including the introduction and conclusion.
sentences.chinese: 本文除緒論和結論外分六章。

sentences.english: The thesis has five chapters other than introduction and conclusion.
sentences.chinese: 正文分爲五章，另有緒論和結語兩部分。

sentences.english: The introduction clarified the motive and the meaning of this topic research.
sentences.chinese: 緒論闡明瞭本課題研究的動機和意義。

sentences.english: The prolegomenon mainly includes four aspects.
sentences.chinese: 緒論部分包括四個方面的內容。

sentences.english: Cat is composed of exordium and four chapters.
sentences.chinese: 全文由緒論和四個章節構成。

sentences.english: This thesis consists of the exordium and ten chapters.
sentences.chinese: 論文包括緒論及十章內容。

sentences.english: The essay consists of five chapters, an introduction, and a conclusion.
sentences.chinese: 本文除緒論及結論兩章外，內容共分五章。

sentences.english: This article includes three parts, introduction and body.
sentences.chinese: 本文包括緒論和正文三部分。

sentences.english: This book has three parts and composes of introduction and two chapters.
sentences.chinese: 本文內容共分三部分，由緒論和二個章節構成。
